original_text: And I saw six men coming from the direction of the upper gate, which faces north, each with a deadly weapon in his hand. With them was a man clothed in linen who had a writing kit at his side. They came in and stood beside the bronze altar.
korean_text: 내가 보니 여섯 사람이 북향한 윗문 길로부터 오는데 각 사람의 손에 죽이는 무기를 잡았고 그 중의 한 사람은 가는 베 옷을 입고 허리에 서기관의 먹 그릇을 찼더라 그들이 들어와서 놋 제단 곁에 서더라

sentences.original_text: coming from the direction of the upper gate
each with a deadly weapon in his hand
With them was a man clothed in linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 있던 한 남자는 아마 옷을 입고 있었다

sentences.original_text: who had a writing kit at his side
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 옆구리에 필기 도구를 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and stood beside the bronze altar
